com.larkwoodlabs.net.udp
Interface UdpEndpoint

All Superinterfaces:
DuplexChannel<UdpDatagram>, MessageInput<UdpDatagram>, MessageOutput<UdpDatagram>
All Known Implementing Classes:
UdpSocketEndpoint
public interface UdpEndpoint
extends DuplexChannel<UdpDatagram>

A DuplexChannel used to send and receive UdpDatagram objects. Classes that implement this interface typically provide some form of UDP transport, using regular sockets or some form of tunneling protocol.

Author:
Gregory Bumgardner (gbumgard)
